name: The Bottom of Glass
description:
In the town of Omnis, a paranormal event disrupts the life of Detective Shelter. In light of this crime, Tom must break the rules to engage in an investigation that will forever change the fate of his life. 

  • Explore the world in search of clues!
  • Interrogate suspects to resolve cases!
  • Use weapons, spells and vehicles!
  • Decide the fate of Tom Shelter through the two available endings!

Available in  :  Italian
